execution_quality: Agent created a functional script and set up a daemon successfully, demonstrating both code creation and system integration capability.
work_category: Implementation of idle-time detection mechanism and daemon setup for screen lock and resource management.
summary: The agent successfully implemented the idle-time-based session clearing daemon as specified, with the user accepting the solution and planning practical testing. The execution was efficient and aligned with user intent for a toggleable system.
follow_up_pattern: User accepted the implementation and planned conditional testing ('use toggle if happens when I don't want it'), indicating readiness to deploy.
